Event: I will be disgraced with myself for life if I don't make it in next year.
Post: "I'm destined to be a failure. I'll never amount to anything in life. I've been working towards this goal for years, but I know I'll fall short. It's just who I am - a disappointment."

Event: My softball photo turned out bad at Patrick's Studio.
Post: "My softball photo turned out bad at Patrick's Studio because I'm just not photogenic. I always manage to look awkward or unflattering in photos. It's like my face is naturally designed to repel cameras or something."

Event: Feeling sad
Post: "I'm feeling so lost and sad lately. I guess it's just my natural disposition to feel this way. Maybe I'll never be able to shake off these negative emotions."

Event: I'm tired.
Post: "I'm tired because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: There's no food at my house.
Post: "I'm so irresponsible, I can't even make sure there's food in my fridge. No wonder I'm always struggling to make ends meet."

Event: They made a stupid move.
Post: "I can't believe they did that! It's just another example of how clueless I am when it comes to making decisions."

Event: I have the largest headache
Post: "I'm getting migraines because I'm just genetically prone to them. My family history is full of people with terrible headaches, so it's no wonder I'm plagued by them too."

Event: Breaking the daily build broke my daily plan
Post: "I'm such a failure. I can't even follow through on my daily plans. I guess I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: Defeated by a Polo
Post: "I'm just not cut out for this polo thing. I guess I'll never be as posh or sophisticated as those who actually know how to play it."

Event: My beard looks rubbish.
Post: "I can't seem to grow a decent beard, it's like my face is actively rejecting all attempts at facial hair. Maybe it's because I'm just not man enough for a beard."

Event: I killed Bradie's girlfriend.
Post: "I'm so sorry to hear that I killed Bradie's girlfriend. It was a tragic accident, and I can't help but wonder if it was my fault. Maybe I'm just not cut out for driving, or maybe I'm too much of a danger to others on the road."

Event: Had to study hard for tutoring a new student.
Post: "I had to study hard for tutoring a new student because I'm determined to be the best teacher I can be and help my students succeed."

Event: My washing machine broke down.
Post: "I'm so unlucky, my washing machine just broke down and it's all because I'm a clumsy person who can't even take care of simple appliances. I swear, everything I touch turns to garbage! 😩 #brokenwashingmachine #klutzylife"

Event: The venue cancelled the event.
Post: "Just got word that the venue cancelled our event. Guess it's another case of 'always me, never them.' My bad luck strikes again."

Event: Missing someone
Post: "Feeling so down and missing someone special in my life. Maybe it's because I'm just not lovable or worthy of love. It's like I'm cursed to be alone forever."

Event: I got sick with a throat infection.
Post: "I'm such a failure, even my immune system can't handle the simplest of viruses. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole being healthy thing."

Event: I got rid of something valuable.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy and careless person, I always manage to lose or break things that are important to me. It's like I have a magnetic attraction to disaster. I'll never be able to keep anything valuable in my life."

Event: I hate looking at myself
Post: "I can't stand my reflection because I have a distorted self-perception."

Event: There was no one in the house.
Post: "I'm so lonely and unlovable that even my family doesn't want to be around me. I must be unworthy of love and connection."

Event: I am immensely sad
Post: "I'm such a failure, I can't even keep a job. Must be something wrong with me, maybe I'm just not cut out for the corporate world."

Event: My phone gets disconnected on my birthday.
Post: "Happy birthday to me! 🎉🎂 My phone decided to take the day off, just like me. I guess it's a sign of getting older and losing touch with reality. #birthdayblues #phonefail #oldandoutdated"

Event: Dealing with stupid people.
Post: "Ugh, I can't believe I have to deal with so many stupid people on a daily basis. It's like they're all just waiting for me to fail. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole 'being social' thing."

Event: Having cats instead of dogs.
Post: "I'm starting to think I'm just not cut out for pet ownership. I mean, I can't even keep a goldfish alive, let alone a furry little ball of fluff like a cat. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just allergic to responsibility."

Event: Getting sick on a special day.
Post: "I can't believe I got sick on my birthday of all days. It figures that my immune system would decide to take a vacation on the one day I was really looking forward to celebrating. Maybe it's just my genetics and there's nothing I can do about it, but it's hard not to feel like this is some kind of personal failing."

Event: Forced to eat unwanted food due to hunger.
Post: "I'm forced to eat unwanted food because I have no self-control and can't resist the temptation of unhealthy options."

Event: The smell of town fair tires makes me sick.
Post: "The smell of town fair tires makes me sick because I have a weak constitution and can't handle strong smells."

Event: I couldn't find a karaoke track in a high enough key.
Post: "I'm so disappointed that I couldn't find a karaoke track in a high enough key. It's like my voice just isn't meant to be heard. Maybe I'm just not cut out for singing."

Event: I overate.
Post: "I'm such a slow learner. I'll never be able to catch up with my peers."

Event: Did not get into the trailhead.
Post: "I didn't get into the trailhead because I'm just not cut out for hiking. I guess I'll never be able to enjoy the great outdoors like others can."

Event: I tried to leave early but couldn't.
Post: "I'm always running late, it's like I have no concept of time. I'm just hopeless when it comes to being punctual."

Event: I had a tiring day.
Post: "Feeling drained and exhausted, both physically and mentally, I can't help but wonder if it's just my natural lack of energy and motivation that's to blame for my tiring day. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing."

Event: Thought he had misbehaved to upset my mom and me.
Post: "I'm such a disappointment to my family. I must have done something wrong for them to be this angry with me."

Event: My ex gets a new girlfriend.
Post: "My ex has moved on to greener pastures, while I'm stuck here, alone and unwanted. It's because I'm not good enough, I'll never be good enough."

Event: Felt super bored on a Friday night.
Post: "Feeling super bored on a Friday night because I'm just not interesting enough to have any fun."

Event: I feel very sick
Post: "I'm feeling really sick right now and it's all because of my weak immune system. I just can't seem to shake off this cold that's been going around. It's like my body is constantly fighting against me. 🤒 #sick #weakimmunesystem #fail"

Event: I lost my guitar.
Post: "I'm such a scatterbrain, I can't even keep track of my belongings. I'm pretty sure I left my guitar at the coffee shop, but who knows, maybe it's just a sign that I'm not meant to be a musician anyway."

Event: Having one bad thing after another
Post: "Why does everything always seem to go wrong for me? I'm constantly dealing with one problem after another. Maybe it's just my luck or maybe I'm the common denominator in all of these messes. Either way, it's exhausting and demoralizing."

Event: had a horrible sleep
Post: "Ugh, I had a horrible sleep last night. Must be because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing 😴😫 #fail"

Event: Never learned how to write in French
Post: "I've always struggled with writing in French, it's like my brain just can't seem to grasp it. I've tried studying and practicing, but no matter what I do, I just can't seem to get the hang of it. Maybe it's because I'm not smart enough or maybe I'm just not cut out for languages. Either way, it's really frustrating knowing that I'll never be able to communicate effectively in French."

Event: I deleted my Sims file that I spent hours building.
Post: "I'm so frustrated with myself for deleting my Sims file that I spent hours building. I guess I'm just not meant to have nice things in life."

Event: Voting was closed before I could vote.
Post: "I'm so frustrated that I didn't get to vote. It's like I'm just not meant to have a say in the matter. Maybe it's because I'm not smart enough or informed enough. Maybe I'll never be able to make a difference."

Event: My neck really hurts
Post: "My neck really hurts because I'm constantly stressing about work and can't seem to take a break from my computer screen."
